networks module

Create wrappers for Keras.Layer.Dense class and keras.Model class for use in KnowledgeNet framework.

Classes

RestrictedLayer :

KnowledgeNet :

class networks.KnowledgeNet(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

Creates a neural network where connections between modules can be specified.

call(inputs, batch_train=True)

Directly process a batch of inputs through the network.

Parameters:

batch_train (bool) – Controls whether training is performed in batches.

class networks.RestrictedLayer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Dense

Build a layer where a specific connections matrix can be applied.

units

Number of neurons for the layer.

Type:

int

connections

Connections mask for weights incoming to the layer (should have same shape as the layer’s weight kernel.

Type:

numpy.ndarray

pbias

Bias to be added to the final output of the layer following the activation.

Type:

float (optional)

call(inputs)

Call the restricted layer on a set of inputs.

Parameters:

inputs (tensor) – A tensorflow tensor of shape (batch_size, n_features)

Returns:

output – The ouput tensor of the layer operation.

Return type:

tensor
